Back to Sergei Prokofiev

Sergei Prokofiev

Gavotte from Hamlet, op. 77bis

1938

[IMSLP]

This is an arrangement of a piece used as incidental music to William Shakespeare’s play Hamlet (op. 77).

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3
